glsa.title: LHa: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: LHa has a buffer overflow in its compression utility with unspecified impact.

background.p: LHa is a console-based program for packing and unpacking LHarc archives.

description.p: A buffer overflow in LHaâ€™s compression code was discovered which can be triggered by a crafted input file.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted file possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All LHa users should upgrade to the latest version:
